attributes.action: Protect us from the misuse of Data Protection Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies and organsistions should not be allowed to use the Data Protection Act as a way of avoiding a valid question. i.e. when the answer to said question would not reveal any personal information.

rejection.details: This is a matter regarding interpretation of existing legislation, and is a matter for direct communication with the relevant organisations.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
